@Jonesy12345 

Yes, you do need to connect. USB to USB.

The hdd/partition3/etc. is what i call i file string (idk if its actually called that) but when the Xbox is connected. you should see its icon on your desktop (Mac) or My Computer (PC/Windows)
Then you click on the icon then click on the hdd file then on partition3 then on cache and place the cache files you downloaded in there and the rest in hdd:/partition3/content/0000000000000000/
Hope this helps!

 -Ace
